game.name: Trapped In The Omniverse
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Trapped In The Omniverse is a first-person survival game blending interdimensional exploration with adventure. Lost in Quantum Dynamics' Antechambers, you must restore the Cosmoportal to return home. Face creatures, overcome obstacles, and uncover the multiverse secrets.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Trapped In The Omniverse is a first-person survival game blending interdimensional exploration with adventure. Lost in Quantum Dynamics' Antechambers, you must restore the Cosmoportal to return home. Face creatures, overcome obstacles, and uncover the multiverse secrets.
